arts.ttl: Roy Keane expects Wolves to do one thing vs Newcastle as Ian Wright changes his mind
arts.sum: Roy Keane expects Wolves to score, but predicts them to lose vs Newcastle Speaking on the Overlap, the Irishman said ‘2 or 3-1, we give Wolves a goal,’ before Ian Wright predicted a 3-0 win for Newcastle.

arts.ttl: Revealed - The delays holding up Newcastle's new stadium, why new badge WON'T appear next season, how club are closing in on Barcelona touts and major injury boost for Wolves visit: Newcastle Confidential
arts.sum: Sources have told Newcastle Confidential the planned order of announcements that the stadium must fall in behind. And there are more issues at hand, too.

arts.ttl: Pre-match Analysis: Will Newcastle’s New Attack Shine Against Wolves?
arts.sum: With their opponents Wolves rooted to the foot of the table with three defeats from their opening three games, this game represents the perfect opportunity for Newcastle to finally earn a first victory of the season and establish some much-needed form ahead of a midweek Champions League clash with Spanish giants Barcelona. However, with the additions of Nick Woltemade and Yoane Wissa to the forward line at the end of the window, Newcastle will expect to rectify the issue in this game and finally find form in front of goal.
